entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Lloydminster
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:38 AM MST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -9.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lloydminster Airport 12:39 PM MST Thursday 19 January 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: -9.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -10.9°C
Wind: WNW 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Fog. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Clearing this afternoon. Fog dissipating this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind west 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. Temperature steady near minus 5.
